name: Vault: Tomb of the King
description:
Vault: Tomb of the King is a retro inspired action-puzzle dungeon crawler. Switch between the Fighter the Thief and the Wizard to overcome deadly enemies and traps.

  • Unique and challenging levels will test your speed, dexterity and intelligence.
  • Find and purchase new items to upgrade your abilities and improve your chance of survival.
  • Experience an engaging story and uncover the truth about King Allard's Tomb.

This demo is localized in English, Spanish and Portuguese!

Vault: Tomb of the King is still in development. If you would like to support the project, please consider liking, following or commenting. Thank you for playing!

If you enjoyed the demo, you can follow progress on:


Join the community on:


Or subscribe to the mailing list at: www.BraveTheVault.com
